item.title: Erin add a quote by Coco Chanel
item.description: "In order to be irreplaceacle, one must always be different." -- Coco Chanel

item.title: Erin add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Those who are easily shocked should be shocked more often." -- Mae West

item.title: Erin add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Erin add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Erin add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Erin add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Erin add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Erin add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Erin add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Erin add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Erin add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Erin add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "I, with a deeper instinct, choose a man who compels my strength, who makes enormous demands on me, who does not doubt my courage or my toughness, who does not believe me naïve or innocent, who has the courage to treat me like a woman." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Erin add a quote by Ann Richards
item.description: "After all, Ginger Rogers did everything that Fred Astaire did. She just did it backwards and in high heels." -- Ann Richards

item.title: Erin add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Lock up your libraries if you like; but there is no gate, no lock, no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Erin add a quote by Cheris Kramarae
item.description: "Feminism is the radical notion that women are human beings." -- Cheris Kramarae

item.title: Erin add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I'm no model lady. A model's just an imitation of the real thing." -- Mae West

item.title: Erin add a quote by Betty Friedan
item.description: "No woman gets an orgasm from shining the kitchen floor. " -- Betty Friedan

item.title: Erin add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Give a girl an education and introduce her properly into the world, and ten to one but she has the means of settling well, without further expense to anybody. " -- Jane Austen

item.title: Erin add a quote by George Meredith
item.description: "A witty woman is a treasure; a witty beauty is a power." -- George Meredith

item.title: Erin add a quote by Elizabeth Peters
item.description: "No woman really wants a man to carry her off; she only wants him to want to do it." -- Elizabeth Peters

item.title: Erin add a quote by Roseanne Barr
item.description: "The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it. " -- Roseanne Barr

item.title: Erin add a quote by Bette Midler
item.description: "My idea of superwoman is someone who scrubs her own floors." -- Bette Midler
